title: omada-central container CPU usage is too high

metadata.alert_name: omada-central container CPU usage is too high
metadata.alertname: omada-central container CPU usage is too high
metadata.expression: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD",container!="", container!="istio-proxy", image!="",pod=~"omada-central.*", namespace=~"sdn5"}[5m])) by (pod, container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{container!="POD",pod=~"omada-central.*", namespace=~"sdn5", resource="cpu"} > 0) by (pod, container)>0.9
